attributes.action: Scrap Parent and Child Parking Bays
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the ridiculous Parent and Child parking bays at UK's supermarket. 1) They are abused by parents who have a car seat but no child with them.
2) It encourages laziness. We need to get rid of the "Oh I am a mother and can't cope" attitude that has become endemic in our society.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the supermarkets.
